metadata.title: CVE-2017-17532 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: examples/framework/news/news3.py in Kiwi 1.9.22 does not validate stringsbefore launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable,which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacksvia a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: kiwi package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
